text: Krais bar e gifongeghavɨra iti, kamaghɨn amizɨ tina e damutɨ, e Krais e gifongezir arazimɨn saghon ikiam? Puvatɨ. Osɨmtɨziba e bativam, o dughiar kuram e bativam, o gumazamiziba arazir kurabar e damuam o, mɨtiriaba en agham o, bizir daghuamiba puvatɨgham o, bizir kuram e gasɨghasɨgham o, me e mɨsoghtɨ e arɨmɨghiram, bizir kabanang e damutɨ, e ti Krais e gifongezir arazimɨn saghon ikiam, o? Bar puvatɨ.
